articles.author: Craig Swan
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou in Celtic reception repayment vow as he rues missed chances in Real Madrid defeat - Daily Record
articles.description: The Aussie wants to bridge the Euro gap after his players were cheered off the pitch despite 3-0 loss to European champions
articles.content:
Ange Postecoglou says he is determined to bridge the Euro gap and repay the Celtic fans after their rapturous Real Madrid send-off. 
 The Aussie boss watched his troops scrap with the Spaniards befo… [+3966 chars]

articles.author: Mitchell Clark
articles.title: Google Maps eco-friendly routing is coming to Europe, and it’s ready for any engine - The Verge
articles.description: People in European countries like France, the UK, and Spain will soon be getting Google Maps’ eco-friendly routing feature, which is being upgraded to take your car’s fuel type into account.
articles.content:
More countries and more features
You can tell maps if you have a petrol, diesel, hybrid, or electric car.
Image: Google
Google is expanding Maps eco-friendly routing mode, rolling the feature out … [+1481 chars]

articles.author: 9News Staff
articles.title: European city to ban meat advertising over climate woes - 9News
articles.description: A European city could become the first in the world to ban advertisements for meat over climate change concerns.
